document_data.name: Ferostil
document_data.mainbody: '''Ferostil''' was a [[warrior]] in the [[Company of the Bright Spear]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 2005||2}}
document_data.Personality:
He liked to trade jests while drunk.

He was merry, though his stares were somewhat lustful, per [[Shandril Shessair]].{{cite book/Crown of Fire||5}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a part of the Company of the Bright Spear until its dissolution.
